plot: Petra choose to reveal some secrets of her past to a stranger who doesn't talk back; a living statue. But the clown does not remain unmoved by her story. This alters the relationship, and choices will have to be made.
title: Petra
plot_es: Petra choose to reveal some secrets of her past to a stranger who doesn't talk back; a living statue. But the clown does not remain unmoved by her story. This alters the relationship, and choices will have to be made.
plot_en: Petra choose to reveal some secrets of her past to a stranger who doesn't talk back; a living statue. But the clown does not remain unmoved by her story. This alters the relationship, and choices will have to be made.
